titleNullable: Facial Expression Recog Image Ver of (FERC)Dataset
subtitleNullable: Image Only Version of the original (FERC) Dataset
descriptionNullable:
## Facial Expression Recog Image Ver of (FERC)Dataset

**Facial Expression Recognition**: *Image Only Version of the original (FERC) Dataset*. 
The original dataset contained images in the form of pixels in string format. It didn't have a clean architecture of the dataset and was not that **easy to go** for any beginner in the Data Science field.

### Acknowledgements
I would like to acknowledge @ashishpatel26  for providing the original dataset.
You can find the link to the original dataset here:- [Here](https://www.kaggle.com/ashishpatel26/facial-expression-recognitionferchallenge)

### Inspiration
I was having an issue working with the pixels in string format type, so I thought of converting every pixel into images. So that it becomes more beginer friendly.

description:
## Facial Expression Recog Image Ver of (FERC)Dataset

**Facial Expression Recognition**: *Image Only Version of the original (FERC) Dataset*. 
The original dataset contained images in the form of pixels in string format. It didn't have a clean architecture of the dataset and was not that **easy to go** for any beginner in the Data Science field.

### Acknowledgements
I would like to acknowledge @ashishpatel26  for providing the original dataset.
You can find the link to the original dataset here:- [Here](https://www.kaggle.com/ashishpatel26/facial-expression-recognitionferchallenge)

### Inspiration
I was having an issue working with the pixels in string format type, so I thought of converting every pixel into images. So that it becomes more beginer friendly.
